DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Evaluate Current Neuromuscular Monitoring Practice Used After Different Types Surgery , Which Neuromuscular Blocking Agents Were Used , With Without Blocking Reversal ( P06556 )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria All criterion must meet participant eligible study participation . The prospective participant : Is adult , 18 65 yearsofage ; Is undergo surgery require general anesthesia nondepolarizing NMBA administration , without NMB reversal ; Meets inclusion criterion list NMBA label country ; Is willing participate sign inform consent form ( ICF ) . Exclusion Criteria Exclusion study determine treat physician . In addition criterion consider determine participant exclude study . The prospective participant : Is pregnant breast feeding ; Has neuromuscular disorder ; Has severe hepatic impairment ; Has severe renal impairment .
